DescriptionData.Title: Yellow with Red Dots Leatherette Child Clown Shoes
DescriptionData.Description: High-top, leather-like kids clown shoes are an amazing deal! Leatherette looks and feels like soft leather, without the price. Polyurethane shoes require little or no maintenance and can be just as durable as real leather. One size fits children's sizes small through extra large. Shoes are hollow, so smaller shoe sizes can wear it with a sneaker or a gel insole inside. The fit is in the lacing, so lace them snugly through the heel and the ankle for a proper fit.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: One size fits children's sizes small thru extra large, and adults with smaller feet.
Polyurethane shoes require little or no maintenance and can be just as durable as real leather
Smaller shoe sizes can wear it with a sneaker or a gel insole inside
The fit is in the lacing, so lace them snugly through the heel and the ankle for a proper fit
